thread.title: ANALYSIS: Airlines in bloom despite mixed market messages
thread.title_full: ANALYSIS: Airlines in bloom despite mixed market messages

author: flightglobal.com
title: ANALYSIS: Airlines in bloom despite mixed market messages
text: Global airlines should consider themselves extremely lucky right now, as their feelings of general good health and optimism, do not span all industries, particularly those in the emerging markets.
